page.title: 12THEFT OF EQUIPMENT
page.content:
Heartless thieves have stolen vital equipment from the Scout Troop in Duntocher Trinity Church.
On May the 27th or 28th someone broke into the church hall taking new camping gear including expensive tents and stoves.The equipment was vital to the boys doing their Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme.Now that it has been stolen it makes things very much more difficult for them because the gear was all lightweight and easy to carry.
Clydebank Police confirmed that camping equipment had been stolen and warned the public to be on the lookout for it.
